concept.title: Specifying the module path
concept.shortdesc:
In order for
to find a task or plan, the task or plan must be in a module on the modulepath. By default, the modulepath includes modules/ and site-modules/ directories inside the project directory.

conbody.p: If you are developing a new plan, you can specify --modulepath <PARENT_DIR_OF/MODULE> to tell Bolt where to load the module. For example, if your module is in ~/src/modules/my_module/, run Bolt with --modulepath ~/src/module. If you often use the same modulepath, you can set modulepath in bolt.yaml.
